name: Meteor Dodger (AnthonyMatute2)
description: Welcome to the most challenging space game you will face! the objective of this game is to avoid the meteors by controlling your astronaut character using the arrow keys but remember... if you touch a meteor, you will lose a life. avoid as many meteors as you can before you run out of lives, lose all five lives and the game is over, collect +1 powerups to regain a life.
